website_summaries.verdict: The Amped Wireless RTA15 is a decent Wi-Fi router, but better firmware is needed for it to live up to its high cost and our expectation.
pros: The powerful Amped Wireless RTA15 router offers long Wi-Fi range, decent data speed, and a robust Web interface
The device is ready to work right out of the box
cons: Compared with similarly priced routers, the RTA15’s performance falls short, especially in terms of Wi-Fi signal stability

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this router to replace a netgear FVG 318 that recently gave up the ghost. As some of the previous reviewers stated, the antenna design on this amped wireless router is not the best. They are very delicate and poorly made. Good thing that I follow instructions as it is a bit tricky putting together. Range is nowhere near what is advertised, in fact the netgear FVG 318 actually had a very similar range if not a bit better. On the good side, customer service was very responsive and did send me out a new set of antennas to try to improve the signal range. All in all however, it was not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Philly

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Signal Range
customer_reviews.text: This may not be a $200 router but it was incredibly easy to setup. One of the easiest setups I every did for a router. Lots of configuration options for those who are technically inclined. The signal is so strong I still had 4 bars on 2.4 and 5 Ghz two houses down. I had to turn down the signal power in the Dashboard (very easy to do btw). You can set up 8 guest networks as well. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: It got so bad, we need to do the power on and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because the claimed performance. Ever since we install this router, wifi service constantly turned off by itself. You need to unplug and plug the power source so often to make it work. It got so bad, we need to do the power on and off on a daily basis. Replaced with a new router 3 months ago, wifi service has had no issue at all. Wish i never bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: A. McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless penetration = great coverage
customer_reviews.text: After doing extensive research, I decided to purchase the Amped Wireless RTA15, and I am glad I did. I get 10 times the coverage we did prior. In terms of quality and signal strength, this has beat out several other name brands we have tried. This is being used in a large industrial shop and due to the construction of the building (concrete, steel) and the large machines we have, signal strength even directly underneath the router was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... the money spent on this expensive router has gone waste in just a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: All the money spent on this expensive router has gone waste in just a few weeks... the DNS server fails and does not associate the units... I called the Amped Wireless Customer service... they accept to replace the unit... but the problem is I have to send the defective unit first to them and then wait for the new router to come to me in the next few days... could be up to 2 weeks.. which basically means, I have to go without a router till we get back the new unit from the customer service. I would not recommend any one to spend any money on this...
customer_reviews.author: N U K

customer_reviews.title: Simple to setup with powerful signal and ability to tune precisely to just classroom area
customer_reviews.text: Classroom with 14 laptops for training. Only had Comcast Starter Package for Internet connection. Old wireless router wouldn't cut it as the signal was dropping out all the time. Research led me to this device and what peaked my interest was the ability to limit the powerful signal to a small area. Absolutely simple to set up and tonight I had word that the trainees had an excellent experience. Thank you Amped Wireless!
customer_reviews.author: R. Crook

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: My old standard power router would drop our devices in some parts of our home. This not only doesn't drop out, it keeps working about half a city block away! My house has aluminum siding and we got no signal at all on the front or rear porch with the old router. Now we get nearly full bars! This is the best wireless router I ever bought! Get one! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Willard C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good router
customer_reviews.text: Powerful Router I'm pleased like that I'm able to add my own antennas to make it better signal :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service
customer_reviews.text: I have dealt with a lot of companies in my life but this one is GREAT. I lost the power supply that came with the product. So I sent an email to the company and offered to buy one. Ricardo - Concierge #127 jumped up on my problem. He was/is great to work with and the company is as responsive as any I have ever worked with.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Taft

customer_reviews.title: 11n router hate my old router
customer_reviews.text: It really did promised the long range feature, tested I still have signal for approx 430 sqm without obstructions. I'm sure it go further than that. Replaced my old 801.11n router hate my old router. This is great recommended for basic router use
customer_reviews.author: Amor Ranola

customer_reviews.title: The performance was terrible, worse than my old 802
customer_reviews.text: Returned this. The performance was terrible, worse than my old 802.11 N routers. I was fine with paying a lot more to get much better performance, but the N band was lower performance than my DLink DIR-655 and the AC performance was on par with the N.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Range!
customer_reviews.text: 150ft away from Router and still had good signal! Blows the 10,000 sq ft advertisement out of the water. Guest networks and VLAN options are awesome. I Can now give access to guests without having to use WPS and giving out my private key. Setting up VLANs is great for segregating personal machines and devices from my other servers. A refresher in math for some. The router advertises 10,000 sq ft. That is 100ft x 100ft area which equals a 100ft diameter. Then cut that in half to a 50ft radius.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Flaky at best
customer_reviews.text: Speeds are great. I absolutely do not get the advertised coverage. I bought this along with the repeater that promises up to a mile of coverage. Hogwash. I'm lucky to get a solid signal that doesn't drop every 5 minutes on the 2nd floor. Not impressed. I'm sure my place could be contributing to it (built in 1960's), but with router and repeater combo like this, I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lacoursiere

customer_reviews.title: Issues with device received. Very good vendor support and RMA procedure.
customer_reviews.text: I set-up the router and the Wireless N/AC (5GHz band) was completely unusable (couldn't even connect to it) unless you were practically in the same room as the router. The 2.4GHz wasn't much better. Contacted Amped Wireless support and was pleasantly surprised by how helpful they were. Offered an RMA with a paid return shipping label. Offered to ship a brand new replacement. I have never had such good service from a consumer product vendor, especially on a refurbished purchase. The only thing that could make this 5 stars is if the RMA resolves my issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Rockett

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with the purchase of this router. Set up was easy and it performs as well as advertised. Great signal strength even in an office building! Love having simultaneous 2.4/5.0GHz bands. Since switching to this router we have consistent speeds on all our pc's.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: i now have two of these just trying to cover a 80 foot long ranch. These have a great range if you have line of site. Trying to go through a couple of insulated walls forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Digitart

customer_reviews.title: its great until i wanted to forward my ports for a ...
customer_reviews.text: its great until i wanted to forward my ports for a game server or even just to play its not very user friendly i havent opened one yet and i tried everthing it has the feature but does not let me i would stay away
customer_reviews.author: Anthony V. Sciuto

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with range...
customer_reviews.text: Had my asus n16 not die of power issue, wouldn't have looked for another router and wasted money on express shipping. Most noticeable dropoff is when going downstairs, as if antennae only broadcast signal upwards. Devices sometimes still show connection to router from far distance, but unable to load anything. Went back to old Cisco Valet router instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This router is a great addition to my home network
customer_reviews.text: This router is a great addition to my home network. I wanted something that would cover my entire .6 acre property and this does the trick. I now have wireless access at my pool and in my shop. Easy setup and great web interface. The analytical tools are very hand as well for picking the proper channel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Research this router before buying
customer_reviews.text: Not the best AC router. Signal loss is bad. Must be rebooted once a week. The maker offers no firmware fix. Do your research if looking for an AC router.
customer_reviews.author: JWS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This here router has excellent range and wonderful speeds. Best router I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: meeks

customer_reviews.title: Great features... less signal strength than my previous router
customer_reviews.text: The features and speed of this device are wonderful. The processor alone keeps up with all the traffic I have in my house, and I was hoping for a much better signal strength, but alas, I have too many metal things between my router's physical location and where I want wifi... so now it's time to get an extender, or new antennas to run off the back of this router, but I'm not giving up yet, and I know based on the responsiveness of everything else in my house - this router's performance is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Over promise, under deliver
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a less than a year old Cisco Router because the Amped Router claimed a much greater range. It did not do so. In all other respects it worked fine, but its range was less that my pre existing router.
customer_reviews.author: GASDOC

customer_reviews.title: Coverage wasn't as good as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job covering the basement and 2nd floor from a base location on the main level - but signal isn't very strong in our attic office - even though its only 25 feet above the transmitter.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Wi-Fi Router for your home network. Great reception throughout the house and easy installation and set-up. Great tech support line if you get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hunter

customer_reviews.title: These routers are good, bought over 50 in the past from other ...
customer_reviews.text: These routers are good, bought over 50 in the past from other venders. The ones I received were defective, one was not usable, only works with 2.4, 5.0 crashes the router. The other had a huge stain on the front. Since I was strapped for time had to repurchase from a retailer near by, cost me...
customer_reviews.author: Anton Salameh

customer_reviews.title: no
customer_reviews.text: Products are NOT built well. Internal antenna stems have broken connections. Must buy new/good Antenna later. No support.
customer_reviews.author: EDward

customer_reviews.title: My soon to arrive unit looks great,,,,, but the real
customer_reviews.text: Statement to know is the company selling it "Why Pay More" is the real find.... a company that I will do buisness with again. We had issues with first used unit and helped us get another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence P. Wick

customer_reviews.title: Some features missing ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't turn off device access over web page from the wireless side.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gent

customer_reviews.title: amped RTA 15 router
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome router! Performs very well. Had a problem with wifi after 3 months, called for support and the 2 techs Jeremy and Hedrick were VERY helpful. Nice to speak with humans for support. This is the 4th or 5th router I have had at this house and it covers house better than all of them.
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Put all my devices at full strength (5 bars), even the garage! You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: paszzz

customer_reviews.title: Slow and horrible range
customer_reviews.text: It had worse range than my old Linksys router and it's throughput was half of my old router. I returned it after two hours of testing and validating my configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B Myers

customer_reviews.title: Had some problems with connecting devices after initial setup, ...
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems with connecting devices after initial setup, so called Amped customer support. Sam, Concierge #138 was a pleasure to work with. He was knowledgeable, patient and professional, and got our system up and running in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: product was unworking. sent it back, still waiting on a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Item was sold as high powered modem wi-fi and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was sold as high powered modem wi-fi and I bought it to replace My Belkin N300 Wireless N Router Model F9K 1002V1,which turns out to be far superior
customer_reviews.author: A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great signal range, may look at purchasing this item again as a new item instead of used like new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: low power
customer_reviews.text: Power a bit lower than i expected , but works ok need to explore it more . Set up was fast and easy. love the dual out put can have different name will see how it work in the summer when I can go further outside my home
customer_reviews.author: phillip D

customer_reviews.title: Good range, no problems.
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting quite good range out of this unit, no problems with functionality, no failures, compared to the basic Linksys router this was sitting next to the range is dramatically further. We have a large property and I often see signal at some pretty long distances. I'd suggest giving it a try if you need better range.
customer_reviews.author: BlackHawk

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work properly in my house. Signal is ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work properly in my house. Signal is inconsistent in the bedrooms although the product has been placed close to the rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Good signal and range
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in a 20,000 square foot two story building with brick walls and we have been getting much better signal and range than with our old router. Also it doesn't seem to get bogged down or switch off if when a large number of devices are connected. I am happy and would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this router is well worth every penny if you desire a stronger signal at further distances. INCREDIBLE, so much better than my previous Netgear 3700 (N600) router with 8 internal antennas. I'll never buy anything but Amped Wireless products from here on.
customer_reviews.author: L. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Good job Ricardo 127.  We are up and running.  Thanks for your your help.  Amped is a good product and the support system is exc
customer_reviews.text: Good job Ricardo 127. We are up and running. Thanks for your help. Amped is a great product and a wonderful support system.
customer_reviews.author: Joetta D. Abbazio

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: Great tech support from #131 the info he give me helped a lot in making some changes on the router.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Griffith

customer_reviews.title: A-OK but not A+
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a five start but I think one of the antennas is looser than it should be. I can work with it ok but it just makes the purchase a little less than perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: i had a linksys wireless that is maybe 3 years old, and I was hoping this new amped wireless would improve the range and actually reach the other floor of my duplex condo... this has less range than the 3-year old linksys model... total fail
customer_reviews.author: STEVE WARD

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom is approximately 80 feet away from this router...same floor, drywall construction. Netgear was not working consistently, which led to my purchase of this router. The specs led me to believe that coverage was readily available in many far away locations. Not in my home. It was only after the additional purchase of the 300N adapter that I was able to receive any signal at all, and that is "moderate". This is probably a good product, but not as powerful as purported to be.
customer_reviews.author: Joan R.

customer_reviews.title: The best in my book
customer_reviews.text: Dual output is awesome! Range is awesome. Ran an external antenna from the unit with coax cable up into the attic, now I get wireless anywhere outside also; wireless security cameras work so much better also!
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: awesomely temperamental
customer_reviews.text: had to re flash unit it took 30 min to get someone to answer phone but once it was set up it was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your cash on this dog.
customer_reviews.text: I had big expectations for this router to improve my range. It didn't do squat for me. I cant get 60 feet w/o significant drop. I even purchased one of AW's range extenders- another wasted slice of cake. Spent time with tech support (waited on hold for at least 10 minutes, then got offered to be called back. I took that option and a couple hours later I got a call back- ultimately no satisfaction. Made me rename SSID's, so had to reconfig all hosts. SOS. Wish I left my old Netgear up...
customer_reviews.author: Moe Cheezmo

customer_reviews.title: Amped Wireless Elite Support exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Amped RTA15 Wireless Router. So far it is working flawlessly. The range is 3x greater than our old router. Initially I had difficulty setting it up. I contacted Ryan at Amped Wireless Elite Support. Through his troubleshooting, we found that the LAN lines throughout our home are CAT4 but needed to be CAT5 to be compatible with the router. He figured out a work-around and had the router up and running within a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: gary f

customer_reviews.title: does nothing what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: despite having such superior parts, this works worse than the linksys valet i replaced. i installed this yesterday hoping to solve my network range issues, but it range is actually less than the valet and costs about 6 times as much. waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Sourz

product_meta.title: Amped Wireless High Power 700mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi Router (RTA15)
product_meta.description:
The Amped Wireless High Power 700mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi Router provides industry leading Wi-Fi coverage coupled with ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi speeds. The RTA15 is equipped with a total of ten amplifiers, two 2.4GHz amplifiers, four 5.0GHz amplifiers, four low noise amplifiers, and three high gain antennas to provide extreme range, gigabit Wi-Fi coverage. The RTA15 is the first device to feature double amplification with advanced 2-stage 5GHz amplifiers that ensure the longest range and the most coverage. The 802.11ac Router features an advanced internal processor, five gigabit networking ports for blazing fast wired connections, a USB port for sharing files and simultaneous dual band Wi-Fi access. Powered by 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology the RTA15 provides gigabit Wi-Fi speeds (AC1200: three times faster than 802.11n) with enough bandwidth to deliver multiple HD streams simultaneously to all of your Wi-Fi devices including, PCs, televisions, game consoles and mobile devices for next generation Wi-Fi access throughout your entire home, backyard or office.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER




HIGH POWER 700MW DUAL BAND AC WI-FI ROUTER
The Amped Wireless High Power 700mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi Router provides industry leading Wi-Fi coverage coupled with ultra-fast 802.11ac Wi-Fi speeds. The RTA15 is equipped with a total of ten amplifiers, two 2.4GHz amplifiers, four 5.0GHz amplifiers, four low noise amplifiers, and three high gain antennas to provide extreme range, gigabit Wi-Fi coverage. 

The RTA15 is the first device to feature double amplification with advanced 2-stage 5GHz amplifiers that ensure the longest range and the most coverage. The 802.11ac Router features an advanced internal processor, five gigabit networking ports for blazing fast wired connections, a USB port for sharing files and simultaneous dual band Wi-Fi access. Powered by 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology the RTA15 provides gigabit Wi-Fi speeds (AC1200: three times faster than 802.11n) with enough bandwidth to deliver multiple HD streams simultaneously to all of your Wi-Fi devices including, PCs, televisions, game consoles and mobile devices for next generation Wi-Fi access throughout your entire home, backyard or office.

How the RTA15 High Power AC Wi-Fi Router works. View larger 
Easy Installation: The Basic Setup Wizard will automatically configure your Internet connection and customize your wireless network. High Power Amplifiers and Antennas: Industry leading Wi-Fi range and coverage.
2-Stage Amplifiers: Double Amplification for Maximum Range. View larger 
Performance comparison to standard
Wi-Fi routers. View larger 
Connectors and Ports for the RTA15. Includes detachable desktop stand. View larger INDUSTRY LEADING DUAL BAND WI-FI COVERAGE
Add long range wireless Internet access to your home or office. Two 2.4GHz 700mW amplifiers, four 5.0GHz 2-Stage 700mW amplifiers, four low noise amplifiers and three 5dBi high gain antennas provide industry leading Wi-Fi power and coverage.

ULTRA-FAST AC WI-FI TECHNOLOGY
Next generation 802.11ac Wi-Fi technology provides Wi-Fi speeds up to three times faster than 802.11n. Great for streaming HD video to multiple devices simultaneously. AC1200 Wi-Fi speeds provide up to 300Mbps 2.4GHz 802.11n connections and up to 867Mbps 5.0GHz 802.11ac connections simultaneously.

ADVANCED 2-STAGE 802.11AC AMPLIFIERS
Similar to how a twin turbo works for a sports car to provide more power and speed, the RTA15 features advanced 2-Stage amplifiers that boost a Wi-Fi signal twice to achieve maximum range and performance.

THREE HIGH GAIN ANTENNAS: PENETRATE WALLS AND ELIMINATE DEAD SPOTS
A dedicated single band 2.4GHz, high gain 5dBi antenna, a dedicated 5.0GHz high gain 5dBi antenna and a high gain dual band antenna provide maximum range to easily penetrate walls and eliminate Wi-Fi dead spots.

GIGABIT NETWORKING
The RTA15 provides up to four 10/100/1000M network ports for connecting additional wired computers, A/V devices and other network devices at ultra-fast wired speeds.

USB STORAGE SUPPORT
Attach a USB storage device, such as an external hard drive or flash drive, to share at home or in the office with other networked computers. Shared files can also be access remotely, over the Internet using a FTP client.

SMART SECURITY FEATURES
Security features allow you to restrict access to specific users, set schedules for when the network is available and when it is not, and control how far your wireless network coverage reaches through output power adjustments. The Router also supports secure push button setup for WPS enabled devices.

WEBSITE BLOCKING AND SPI FIREWALL PROTECTION
Block access to specific websites and protect your network from outside intruders with an advanced SPI firewall.

GUEST NETWORKS
Create up to 8 additional wireless networks for guests or conference rooms with access to the Internet only. Protect your local computers and servers from access by guest users.

GREAT FOR LARGE HOMES AND OFFICES
The high power Wi-Fi capabilities of the RTA15 is great for providing powerful wireless coverage for larger homes, backyards, offices and warehouses.

SUPPORTS IPV6 INTERNET CONNECTIONS
Support for basic IPv6 Internet connections and firewall features.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
High Power 700mW Dual Band AC Wi-Fi Router, one detachable high gain 5dBi 2.4GHz antenna, one detachable high gain 5dBi 5.0GHz antenna, one detachable high gain dual band antenna, power adapter (100-240v), RJ-45 Ethernet cable, setup guide, CD: user's guide and installation video, and desktop stand / cable organizer.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Technology: AC1200
Bands: Simultaneous 2.4/5.0GHz, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac
Wireless Speed: 2.4GHz: 300Mbps (Tx/Rx), 5.0GHz: 867Mbps (Tx/Rx)
Antennas: 1 x detachable high gain 5dBi 2.4GHz antenna, 1 x detachable high gain 5dBi 5.0GHz antenna, 1 x detachable high gain dual band antenna 
Ethernet Ports x Speed: 1 x RJ-45 10/100/1000M WAN port (modem port), 4 x RJ-45 10/100/1000M LAN ports (local ports), 1 x USB 2.0 port for USB storage
Amplifiers: 2 x 2.4GHz 700mW amplifiers, 2 x 5.0GHz 700mW amplifiers (2-stage), 4 x low noise amplifiers
Setup Requirements: Broadband (cable/DSL) modem with Ethernet port, computer with wired (RJ-45) or wireless (802.11a/b/g/n or ac) adapter
OS Compatibility: Works with all OS, including Windows and Mac.

Industry leading technical support
and customer service.


Includes Free Wi-Fi Analytics Tool Android App to help optimize and analyze Wi-Fi networks. 
Satisfaction guaranteed with the Amped Wireless Range Increase Guarantee. AMPED WIRELESS ROUTER COMPARISON

Wireless coverage claims are used only as a reference and are not guaranteed as each wireless network is uniquely different. Maximum wireless signal rate derived from IEEE 802.11 standard specifications. Actual data throughput may vary as a result of network conditions and environmental factors. AC1200 wireless signal speeds achieved when connecting to other 802.11ac devices.

feature_bullets: Share your broadband Internet connection and provide long range wireless access
Ten high power amplifiers and three high gain antennas deliver industry leading Wi-Fi coverage
Next generation, ultra-fast AC1200 Wi-Fi speeds provide fast HD streaming and lag-free gaming
Advanced 2-Stage amplifiers use double amplification to achieve maximum range
Features a powerful processor, five gigabit wired ports and a USB storage sharing port
